step1.title: One Command. Full Server.

hook.title: We Can't Access Your Servers.
hook.subtitle: Zero SSH keys. Zero root passwords. Zero backdoors. Built on math, not trust.

legacy.title: Legacy Cloud
legacy.text: "You have my keys. Please don't look at my data. If you get hacked, I'm finished."

serverflow.title: ServerFlow Model
serverflow.text: "My keys stay on my server. Even if you disappear tomorrow, my site stays live."
serverflow.quote: The provider is just a bridge.

mechanics.title: One-Way Communication.

diagram.details: NO SSH NEEDED • NO PORTS OPEN • TOTAL PRIVACY

mechanics.description: We can't login to your system. We can't see your data.
mechanics.descriptionHighlight: Our orchestrator only hears what your agent allows.

cards.title: Ed25519 Crypto
cards.description: Mathematical proof that we can't spoof commands. The same protocol used by Signal and OpenSSH.

cards.title: Nothing to Steal
cards.description: We store ZERO credentials. If ServerFlow is breached, hackers find an empty room. No keys to take.

cards.title: We Die, You Live
cards.description: If we vanish tomorrow, your business continues. No kill-switch, no phone-home, no vendor lock-in.

cards.title: Audit the Agent
cards.description: Our agent is 100% Open Source. Verify every line of code before you install. Trust the math.

list.title: Zero-Trust Security
list.description: We never access your servers. Agent initiates outbound connections only. No SSH keys stored, ever.

list.title: Hot Patching
list.description: Deploy code changes in < 2 seconds. Auto-rollback if crash detected within 10s. Perfect for AI iteration loops.

list.title: Multi-Cloud Native
list.description: Hetzner, DigitalOcean, OVH, Vultr, AWS, Scaleway... Your VPS, your rules. Zero vendor lock-in.

list.title: MCP Integration
list.description: Deploy via natural language with Claude or Cursor. "Deploy my app to production" just works.

list.title: Auto SSL & Nginx
list.description: Let's Encrypt certificates generated automatically. Nginx configured in seconds. HTTPS by default.

list.title: Self-Healing
list.description: Services auto-restart on failure. PM2 process management. Your apps stay online even if we don't.

list.name: Alex Chen
list.text: I used to spend 3 hours configuring Nginx and Let's Encrypt for each new project. Now I paste one command and I'm live on my $5 Hetzner VPS in under 5 minutes. Game changer for shipping fast.

list.name: Sarah Miller
list.text: Finally something that bridges local AI coding and real production without the Vercel markup. I keep my infrastructure, I keep my money. ServerFlow just handles the deployment magic.

list.name: Thomas Dubois
list.text: The MCP integration is insane. I literally told Claude 'deploy the new feature to staging' and it happened. No context switching, no terminal, just shipping. My team's velocity doubled.

list.name: Emma Rodriguez
list.text: I was skeptical about the Zero-Trust claims. After auditing the agent code, I'm impressed. Outbound connections only, Ed25519 signing, no credentials stored. This is how it should be done.

list.name: Marcus Johnson
list.text: I manage 12 side projects across 4 different VPS providers. ServerFlow unified everything in one dashboard. Hot patching means I can iterate with Claude and see changes in 2 seconds. Addictive.
